). If further studies will allow for generalizing
this observation, a lower requirement for the model complexity in modeling of NIR spectra could
open other opportunities for reﬁning the theoretical approach. For example, a hybrid approach
combining higher-level harmonic computations augmenting DVPT2/GVPT2 anharmonic analysis
could be used. Barone and co-workers have reported evidences of accurate and affordable hybrid
